00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_3_SAT_H
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_3_SAT_H
00022 
00023 // VarToCount = 1 means leq, = 0 means geq.
00024 template<typename VarArray>
00025 struct BoolThreeSATConstraintDynamic : public AbstractConstraint
00026 {
00027   virtual string constraint_name()
00028   { return "BoolSATDynamic"; }
00029   
00030   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00031   
00032   VarArray var_array;
00033 
00034   BoolThreeSATConstraintDynamic(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array) :
00035     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array)
00036   { 
00037     D_ASSERT(var_array.size() == 3);
00038   }
00039   
00040   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00041   { 
00042     return 2;
00043   }
00044   
00045   // Not specialised for 3 sat
00046   virtual void full_propagate()
00047   {
00048     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00049     
00050     int array_size = var_array.size(); 
00051     int trig1, trig2;
00052     int index = 0;
00053     
00054     while(index < array_size && !var_array[index].inDomain(1))
00055       ++index;
00056     
00057     trig1 = index;
00058 
00059     if(index == array_size)
00060     { // Not enough triggers
00061       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00062       return;
00063     }
00064     
00065     ++index;
00066     
00067     while(index < array_size && !var_array[index].inDomain(1))
00068       ++index;
00069     
00070     trig2 = index;
00071     
00072     if(index >= array_size)
00073     { // Only one valid variable.
00074       var_array[trig1].propagateAssign(1);
00075       return;
00076     }
00077     
00078     dt->trigger_info() = trig1;
00079     var_array[trig1].addDynamicTrigger(dt, UpperBound);
00080     
00081     ++dt;
00082     
00083     dt->trigger_info() = trig2;
00084     var_array[trig2].addDynamicTrigger(dt, UpperBound);
00085     
00086     return;
00087   }
00088   
00090   inline int other_val(int a, int b)
00091   {
00092     if(a != 0 && b != 0)
00093       return 0;
00094   
00095     if(a != 1 && b != 1)
00096       return 1;
00097     
00098     return 2;
00099   }
00100   
00101   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00102   {
00103     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Dyn3SAT);
00104     int propval = dt->trigger_info();
00105     //int var_size = var_array.size();
00106     
00107     DynamicTrigger* base_dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00108     int other_propval;
00109     
00110     if(base_dt == dt)
00111       other_propval = (base_dt + 1)->trigger_info();
00112     else
00113       other_propval = base_dt->trigger_info();
00114     
00115 
00116     int unchecked_val = other_val(propval, other_propval);
00117     
00118     if(var_array[unchecked_val].inDomain(1))
00119     {
00120       // Found new value to watch
00121       dt->trigger_info() = unchecked_val;
00122       var_array[unchecked_val].addDynamicTrigger(dt, UpperBound);
00123     }
00124     else
00125     { var_array[other_propval].propagateAssign(1); }
00126   }
00127   
00128   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00129   {
00130     D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size());
00131     int count = 0;
00132     for(int i = 0; i < v_size; ++i)
00133       count += (v[i] == 1);
00134     return count > 0;
00135   }
00136   
00137   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00138   { 
00139     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00140     vars.reserve(var_array.size());
00141     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00142       vars.push_back(AnyVarRef(var_array[i]));
00143     return vars;  
00144   }
00145   
00146   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00147   {
00148     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00149     {
00150       if(var_array[i].getMax() > 0)
00151       {
00152         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, var_array[i].getMax()));
00153         return true;
00154       }
00155     }
00156     return false;
00157   }
00158 };
00159 
00160 template<typename VarArray>
00161 AbstractConstraint*
00162 BoolThreeSATConDynamic(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array)
00163 { return new BoolThreeSATConstraintDynamic<VarArray>(stateObj, _var_array); }
00164 
00165 #endif
